cause.description:
Seems like lobbyists and law-makers around this country are more and more frequently putting our pristine waterways in jeopardy to create eco-less systems. Write your senators and demand water rights that promise minimum instream flow rates at certain points along the rivers in your area.
Here's what's happening in Ft. Collins, CO
Save the Poudre Coalition: http://www.savethepoudre.org/
NISP Projects: http://www.riverside.com/projects/marketing_flyers/NISP.asp
More information: http://www.fortcollinsweekly.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=706&Itemid=35
American Rivers: http://www.americanrivers.org
What Gunnison, CO did to help preserve the Gunnison: http://www.eddyflower.com/RunDetail.aspx?RunId=302
1. Demand responsible action from state and local officials regarding water use rights and minimum instream flow.
2. Use waterways for fun and increase local, public usage to help ally people with rivers.
3. Educate those around you with a sense of respect for something that sustains us indefinitely.
cause.mission: preserve the water we depend on for our daily existence.
